solution_line_template: Bea's sales amount to ${bea_price_solution_decimal}/glass x {bea_glasses_sold} glasses = {bea_total_sales_cents} cents.
Dawn's sales amount to ${dawn_price_solution_decimal}/glass x {dawn_glasses_sold} glasses = {dawn_total_sales_cents} cents.
So, Bea earned ${bea_earnings_dollars_in_solution_text} - ${dawn_earnings_dollars_in_solution_text} = {difference_in_cents} cents more than Dawn.
